name: ml-xsadd
description: JavaScript implementation of the XORSHIFT-ADD (XSadd) pseudo random number generator

scripts.test: npm run test-only && npm run tslint
scripts.tsc: npm run clean && npm run tsc-es5 && npm run tsc-es6
